title: Recapping the Premiere Episode of ‘We Own This City’
description:
Bill Simmons, Chris Ryan, and Wosny Lambre recap the premiere episode of HBO’s 'We Own This City.' They discuss how the show feels like 'The Wire,' the absence of humor, Jon Bernthal’s performance, and more.
Hosts: Bill Simmons, Chris Ryan, and Wosny Lambre
Producer: Jessie Lopez
